permission.name: ui.access
permission.summary: Allow access to the Web UI
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to login and access the web user interface

permission.name: ui.config.view
permission.summary: Allow access to view basic check configuration
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to view basic check configuration, this does not include check command configuration.

permission.name: ui.view.config-all
permission.summary: Allow access to view all check configuration
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to view all check configuration, including sensitive data.

permission.name: ui.view.stats
permission.summary: Allow access to view check statistics
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to view statistics about a check

permission.name: api.access
permission.summary: Allow API access
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to utilise the API

permission.name: api.read.*
permission.summary: Allow reading of objects via the API
permission.description: Root of all API read permissions

permission.name: api.write.*
permission.summary: Allow modification of objects via the API
permission.description: Root of all API write permissions

permission.name: api.write.contact.set-password
permission.summary: Allow changing of passwords
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to set passwords of an contact

permission.name: api.write.contact.create
permission.summary: Allow creation of contacts
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to create contacts

permission.name: api.read.contact
permission.summary: Allow reading of contacts
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to read contacts

permission.name: api.read.contact.config
permission.summary: Allow reading of contact configuration
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to read contact configuration

permission.name: api.write.team.create
permission.summary: Allow creation of teams
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to create teams

permission.name: api.read.team
permission.summary: Allow reading of teams
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to read teams

permission.name: api.read.team.config
permission.summary: Allow reading of team configuration
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to read team configuration

permission.name: api.write.team.add-contact
permission.summary: Allow adding a contact to a team
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to add a contact to a team

permission.name: api.write.team.add-child
permission.summary: Allow adding a child team to a team
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to add a child team to a team

permission.name: api.write.team.remove-contact
permission.summary: Allow adding a contact to a team
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to remove a contact from a team

permission.name: api.write.team.remove-child
permission.summary: Allow adding a child team to a team
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to remove a child team from a team

permission.name: api.write.time-period.create
permission.summary: Allow creation of time periods
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to create time periods

permission.name: api.read.time-period
permission.summary: Allow reading of time periods
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to read time periods

permission.name: api.read.time-period.config
permission.summary: Allow reading of time periods configuration
permission.description: A contact must be granted this permission in order to be able to read time period configuration
